name: Bubble Bubble Fishing
description:
A Game Made In 72 Hours For:

 ==The Fishing Jam== 

 ==Mini Jam 84: Bubbles== 

- Theme(s): Bubble & Fishing - Limitation: You Are Your Own Ammo -

Catch fish as one of three cats  as they sore through the air straight out of the ocean! Simply cast a fishing rod into the bubbling spots under the deck, and then fishing them straight out of the sky. 

No fishing rod? No problem! For what other reason do cats have tails, use yours to handle your trusty hook.  The bubbles  can easily be popped using one after all. 

Rack up points  to claim a High Score, while catching fish from the ocean to keep the timer off 0.  

--------------------------------

Controls:

Control + F for Fullscreen

---------------------------------

All Music By Komiku:

Opening ! : https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_/Komiku_-...
